entities.name: Dennis, Golden God
entities.opening_dialog: A starter car? This car is a finisher car! A transporter of gods! The Golden God!
entities.closing_dialog: All right, all right, all right, all right~

entities.name: Frank, Mastermind in the Coil
entities.opening_dialog: Mwleh, Charlie, I gotta go to the playground, don't follow me!
entities.closing_dialog: It's Saturday coming up, kids are gonna be here!
